SELECT CommentID, MemberOf, TargetServiceType, TargetID, `Comment`, Context, LikeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_like WHERE TargetID = CAST(a.CommentID AS VARCHAR(50)) AND RegisterCode = #{UserCode} AND TargetServiceType = 'Comment') AS MyLikeCount, ReplyCount,
'Anonymous' AS RegisterCode,
RegisterCode,
RegistDate, DeleteDate, Reserved1, Reserved2, Reserved3, Reserved4, Reserved5, (CASE WHEN RegisterCode = #{UserCode} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS AnonymousAuthYn FROM covi_smart4j.sys_comment a WHERE 1=1
AND TargetServiceType IN ('Board', 'Doc', 'Community')
AND TargetServiceType = #{targetServiceType}
AND TargetID = #{targetID} AND (DeleteDate IS NULL OR (DeleteDate IS NOT NULL AND (SELECT COUNT(CommentID) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_comment b WHERE b.MemberOf = a.CommentID AND b.DeleteDate IS NULL) > 0) )
ORDER BY MemberOf, CommentID DESC
